owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns._0: Address of the unsafe block signer.
Semver contract version as a string.

MINIMUM_GAS_LIMIT().notice: Minimum gas limit. This should not be lower than the maximum deposit gas resource         limit in the ResourceMetering contract used by MantlePortal, to ensure the L2         block always has sufficient gas to process deposits.

UNSAFE_BLOCK_SIGNER_SLOT().notice: Storage slot that the unsafe block signer is stored at. Storing it at this         deterministic storage slot allows for decoupling the storage layout from the way         that `solc` lays out storage. The `mt-node` uses a storage proof to fetch this value.

batcherHash().notice: Identifier for the batcher. For version 1 of this configuration, this is represented         as an address left-padded with zeros to 32 bytes.

setUnsafeBlockSigner(address).notice: Updates the unsafe block signer address.

unsafeBlockSigner().notice: High level getter for the unsafe block signer address. Unsafe blocks can be         propagated across the p2p network if they are signed by the key corresponding to         this address.

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.

MINIMUM_GAS_LIMIT().notice: Minimum gas limit. This should not be lower than the maximum deposit gas resource         limit in the ResourceMetering contract used by MantlePortal, to ensure the L2         block always has sufficient gas to process deposits.

UNSAFE_BLOCK_SIGNER_SLOT().notice: Storage slot that the unsafe block signer is stored at. Storing it at this         deterministic storage slot allows for decoupling the storage layout from the way         that `solc` lays out storage. The `mt-node` uses a storage proof to fetch this value.

batcherHash().notice: Identifier for the batcher. For version 1 of this configuration, this is represented         as an address left-padded with zeros to 32 bytes.

setUnsafeBlockSigner(address).notice: Updates the unsafe block signer address.

unsafeBlockSigner().notice: High level getter for the unsafe block signer address. Unsafe blocks can be         propagated across the p2p network if they are signed by the key corresponding to         this address.

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.

userdoc.notice: The SystemConfig contract is used to manage configuration of an Mantle network. All         configuration is stored on L1 and picked up by L2 as part of the derviation of the L2         chain.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns._0: Address of the unsafe block signer.
Semver contract version as a string.

@notice Identifier for the batcher. For version 1 of this configuration, this is represented
         as an address left-padded with zeros to 32 bytes.

@notice Updates the unsafe block signer address.
 @param _unsafeBlockSigner New unsafe block signer address.

@notice Updates the batcher hash.
 @param _batcherHash New batcher hash.

@notice Updates the L2 gas limit.
 @param _gasLimit New gas limit.
